product.text:
Mickey's Christmas Carol

Lovable Disney characters take center stage in this delightful rendition of Charles Dickens’ classic holiday story that demonstrates the true meaning of Christmas. Mickey Mouse stars as the poor yet humble Bob Cratchit, while miserly Scrooge McDuck is featured as Uncle Scrooge. When Scrooge is visited by the Ghost of Christmas Past, he decides to change his stingy ways after Goofy’s neighbor—in the role of the Ghost of Christmas Future—shows him his grave. Love, sharing, and the true meaning of Christmas are delightfully portrayed.

Tie-in Activity: Engage your child in a discussion regarding the true meaning of Christmas, and ask her to recount the valuable lessons learned by Scrooge McDuck. Stress the importance of generosity, spending time with loved ones, and helping those less fortunate.
